about_the_game:
The Shaman's Ark is a dream game that I wanted to make as personal as possible. Therefore, during its development, I began learning how to write music. Here, I offer you a selection of ambience tracks from the game that convey the game's atmosphere. I hope the sound of the shaman's drum will delight your ears and hearts. Enjoy listening!



Who are you, Shaman?
Long, long ago, when the old world was engulfed by the Abyss, the Great Shaman saved his people by giving them a new home. It was a world above the Abyss, called the Ark. Many years have passed, generations have changed, and the Great Shaman has become nothing more than a hero of old legends. However, the Abyss has not disappeared. One day, it began seeping into the lands of the Ark, drop by drop. And just when hope was fading, the Shaman returned from the darkness.

name: The Shaman's Ark Soundtrack
short_description: A dark metroidvania with unique rhythm combat. As the enigmatic Shaman, your journey unfolds in battling monsters to either save the Ark or plunge it irreversibly into darkness.
